context: Chewy went public in June 2019, backed by PetSmart. The company was the leading online pet retailer with exceptional customer service and Autoship subscription model.

competitors.name: Amazon
competitors.notes: Largest online retailer expanding pet category

competitors.name: Walmart
competitors.notes: Mass retailer with large pet section online and in-store

competitors.name: Costco
competitors.notes: Warehouse club with pet food selection
